name: Space Cat: 20XX
description:
Submission for One Button Game Jam

Design/Development - Mark Calhoun of Digital Pixels, LLC

Music - Josh Penn-Pierson

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtT2RFYJdqg1lxWZE...

Controls - Keyboard: Space Bar OR Controller: A button

Story - You are Space Cat and the year is 20XX! You are the last known cat in the universe and the aliens want to experiment on you! Take them down and make them remember the name SPACE CAT.

Time your actions using the action bar at the top of the screen. Press space or 'A' on a controller when the action you want to perform is in the action box. Stay on your toes as actions, waves of enemies, and enemy lasers generate randomly!

Project Status - This project is technically finished for the purposes of the game jam, but is still considered in development because there are some features and refinements I would like to add.

Questions or comments? Leave them below or contact me at mark.calhoun@digitalpixelsgames.com.
